english: The raid was all over in three minutes .
chinese: 抢劫前后一共只持续了三分钟。

english: Two masked men held up a mail van .
chinese: 两个戴面具的人拦路抢劫了一辆邮车。

english: To ask such prices is sheer robbery .
chinese: 要这样的价钱简直是明火执仗的抢劫。

english: The mugger thrust at his victim with a knife .
chinese: 抢劫者用刀子向受害人刺去。

english: He has done time for armed robbery .
chinese: 他曾因持械抢劫罪而服刑。
抢劫造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His account of the robbery won't hold water .
chinese: 他对抢劫案经过的陈述漏洞百出。

english: He was put away for ten years for armed robbery .
chinese: 他因持械抢劫而关押了十年。
私自抢劫要受到严惩的。

english: He was sent down for ten years for armed robbery .
chinese: 他因持械抢劫被判入狱十年。

english: The police have uncovered a scheme of robbery .
chinese: 警察当局破获了一起阴谋抢劫案。

english: The police put a shadow on the suspected robber .
chinese: 警方派探员盯住那个抢劫疑犯。

english: Owen had said it was robbery .
chinese: 欧文曾说过，这是抢劫行为。

english: He made out that he had been robbed .
Do not move , this is a stick-up !
The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills .
chinese: 村民们受到山里强盗抢劫。
